Title: Relates to grants for graduate medical education in Lyme and tick-borne disease
Summary: Authorizes the commissioner of health to award grants for graduate medical education in Lyme and tick-borne disease and to designate organizations as centers for Lyme and tick-borne disease excellence.
LawCode: Add ยง2799, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, in relation to grants for graduate medical education in Lyme and tick-borne disease
